text: Guillermo Feliú Cruz was a Chilean historian, bibliographer and librarian. He learned historical method by José Toribio Medina who later successfully proposed Feliú Cruz as curator of Biblioteca Americana in the Biblioteca Nacional de Chile. ==References== Category:1900 births Category:1973 deaths Category:Cruz Family Category:20th-century Chilean historians Category:Chilean librarians Category:Chilean curators Category:Chilean bibliographers Category:People from Talca Category:Instituto Nacional General José Miguel Carrera alumni Category:20th-century historians
title: Guillermo Feliú Cruz
